This game is about Mr Freeman and his quest for the holy grail, he has a lot to lose but a lot to gain because he is been followed by a woman called... I forgot, but it starts with a C? Maybe, doesn't matter all that matters is you have a gun, you have to kill the zombies called faceman. If you don't all they do is scream and say "Help me", what's that all about?

When you first start the game, you may be thinking "wait, am I looking outside my house" the graphics are amazing, and this is a game from 2004, then you start to play the game and then you think "why can't I see my feet" that is when you realise you're still playing the game and not outside.

The gameplay can be summed up like this, it's pretty good.

I like G man best because he has a funny way of talking, imagine if you were to hear him in real life and then you will think "wow, am I in real life here or not? nope, still playing the game", that's the thing about this game, it's so real that you will be thinking there is a war outside your house, it is pretty much the most real game ever to exist.

Would I recommend this game? Yes, because every second I played it I just wanted to go outside because it was like I was already there.

Would I play again? Probably, if I feel like going outside I will go on this game and not outside because there is a war in the game and only I can stop it.

Would you play the game again? Yes, there is many reasons to play again, A) It's good B) it's got aliens and zombies C) it looks like rea life.

Half-Life 2 is the measuring stick against which all other story-driven action games are compared, and for good reason. The atmosphere is engrossing, the story grips you and doesn't let go. The gameplay is equally as satisfying and balanced. A multitude of environments, weapons and battles that never disappoint. Difficult and engaging, but never to the point of tedium or frustration. There was never a moment playing this game where I found myself thinking, "Hurry up and get to the fun part," because it's all the fun part. Half-Life 2 will leave you wishing for more, wanting to know what fate awaits Gordon and his friends, and all of humanity.
This game was the gateway to the 10 years of my life consumed by Steam
Great gameplay, great story, great everything. No wonder it's a classic Valve work of art

Continuing where Half-Life left off, you start off in an unfamiliar city. Soon however, begins an epic journey and a none-stop adventure full of puzzles, weapons, enemies, and a couple unlikely allies. The graphics and physics engine were beyond the game's time and continue to be rather impressive. The story itself is explained mostly in Half-Life, where as this game leaves you to find out what happened after the Black Mesa incident. The roaming capabilities and range of weapons and ragdoll physics keeps the game exicting and adventurous. So whether you're here to stay or passing through on your way to games unknown, I recommend Half-Life 2.

Der innovativste FPS unserer Zeit!

Mit Half-Life 2 ging die grandiose VIdeospielserie des  amerikanischen Unternehmens Valve in die nächste Runde! 
In Half-LIfe 2 wurde die Welt von einer ausserirdischen Spezies namens Combine unterjocht. Dies ist für die Menschen jedoch nicht gerade erfreulich, da diese in der Welt nur noch einen sehr geringen Stellenwert besitzen. Als Gordon Freeman versucht  man nun die Herrschaft der Combine zu beenden, was sich jedoch als sehr schwierig erweist und ihn in einige haarsträubende Angelegenheiten führt!
Half-Life 2 beinhaltet das, was sein Vorgänger schon besaß. Perfektion! Dieses Spiel begeistert durch seine epische, fesselnde Geschichte, wie Gordon Freeman gegen die Unterdrückung kämpft, durch das innovative und abwechslungsreiche Gameplay und durch die wunderbare und makellose KI. Auch die Grafik kann sich für das Jahr 2004 durchaus sehen lassen. DIe Gestik und Mimik der Charaktere sind einfach grandios und kann sogar mit einem aktuellen Spiel wie zum Beispiel GTA V konkurrieren. 
Mit diesem Spiel hat Valve den anderen FPS-Entwicklern gezeigt wie man einen richtigen FPS entwickelt. Einfach ein Meisterwerk! Wer dieses Spiel noch nicht gespielt hat, muss es definitiv nachholen, denn er hat eindeutig etwas verpasst. Einfach ein Muss für jeden FPS-LIebhaber!
An Valve: Könntet ihr nicht endlich Half-Life 3 bzw. Episode 3 rausbringen. Warte schon Äonen darauf und möchte unbedingt wissen, wie es weitergeht! ;D

This game is an essential addition to any FPS fan's library.  I have played it through multiple times and it gets better every time.  The gameplay mechanics are starting to show there age, but that does not make it any less fun to play.  If you haven't played this game, I suggest buying the Orange Box and getting the other excellent Valve games with it because you will undoubtably want to play them next.

Lets just start out with: Without the Half-Life series the Genre would be very different. Half-Life and Half-Life 2 molded what the Genre is today. If you consider yourself a gamer and have never completed a Half-Life game you are missing out on an epic experience. This experience aged well. This game still looks good by all standards 10 years later. The Gameplay is unmatched.

(oh and just incase you're wondering about my time played. I had this game before steam counted hours played. I can assure you I've spent more than 3 hours playing it)

Score: 10/10

Zdecydowanie warto zagrać. Niesamowity klimat, intrygująca historia i cały czas inny pomysł na rozgrywkę. Wydaje się, że gra daje nam do dyspozycji jedynie 10 sztuk broni, jednak gameplay jest bardzo różnorodny. Raz płyniemy łodzią, raz bronimy się w pełnym zombie miasteczku, a jeszcze innym razem wspinamy się po delikatnej konstrukcji mostu przy okazji zestrzeliwując śmigłowiec. Gra napakowana strzelaninami, eksploracją, a nawet okazjonalnymi zagadkami środowiskowymi. Jedyna rzecz na którą można narzekać to niezbyt okazała długość rozgrywki, jednak przy ogromnej ilości modów dostępnych za darmo, Half-Life 2 jest naprawdę dobrą pozycją do zakupienia.

One of the best games I've ever played. HL2 is simply unforgettable.

Сохранив атмосферу тревоги, вызова и внутреннего напряжения и добавив новый реализм и интерактивность, Half-Life 2 открывает дверь в мир, в котором присутствие игрока влияет на все, что его окружает — от физической среды до поведения и даже эмоций как друзей, так и врагов. Эта игра шокирует игровую индустрию сочетанием напряженного действия и непрерывного, затягивающего сюжета. Напряженный геймплей Half-Life 2 в режиме реального времени стал возможным исключительно благодаря Source®, — новому собственному высокотехнологичному игровому движку от Valve. Игрок вновь поднимает монтировку ученого-исследователя Гордона Фримена, который обнаруживает себя на наводненной чужаками Земле, ресурсы которой стремительно опустошаются, а население вырождается. Фримену навязана неизбежная роль спасителя человечества от того зла, которое он выпустил на свободу в Черной Мезе. И очень многие дорогие ему люди надеются на него...

Half life 2, One of the most popular video games. This game is great in almost every way. With a suspenseful and action-packed   story, and plenty of weapons to slaughter some zombies or combine! When this was released back in 2004, most people sh!t their pants. Now about the zombies, this is the most strange, gross, and creative way of making a zombie ive ever seen! Just incredible! How did they think of such a type of zombie like that?! This is one of the best games I have ever played, and it has almost no flaws, the puzzles are great, graphics were amazing for its time, and the action and gameplay is incredible, and all for only $9.99! Half Life 2, buy it now, as I give it a  5/5
